channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk dies after being shot at Utah college event
item.description: Charlie Kirk, the CEO and co-founder of the conservative youth organization Turning Point USA, has died after being shot Wednesday at a Utah college event, President Donald Trump says.

item.title: Charlie Kirk, who helped build support for Trump among young people, dies after campus shooting
Photos from Utah Valley University before and after the shooting of Charlie Kirk
